title: Eight mortgage predictions for 2026
full_text: Eight mortgage predictions for 2026. We spoke to five mortgage experts to get their take on what will happen to mortgage products, interest rates and the market in general.. Last year was all about mortgage rates coming down, with four Bank of England cuts, taking the base rate from 4.75% at the beginning of the year, to 3.75% by December. For the most part, mortgage len… [+6780 chars]
